basics.name: Angel Gabriel Lopez Solano
basics.label: Full-Stack developer with +2 years of experience & basketball player
summary: Results-driven software developer with 2+ years of experience crafting impactful, real-world applications in .NET, Next.js, and Dynamics 365. Recognized for designing reliable, scalable solutions in areas such as citizen safety, education, and fintech. Blending technical expertise with a proactive, solution-oriented mindset.

Skilled in collaborative and independent work environments, consistently delivering clean, efficient code that exceeds expectations. Eager to contribute technical insights and innovation to a dynamic team.
